data.actual_result: The name is in the incorrect format as just "@Username". Either @ should be removed or discrim be added as well.
data.expected_result: The mentioning of the user name should either be in the format of "@Username#discrim" or "Username#discrim" or just "Username"
data.short_description: Tap holding any user name in Direct Messages list brings up the mini profile of that user with incorrect mentioning of the user name on it.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Direct Messages list. - Tap hold on any user name to bring up the mini profile - Notice the mentioning of the name on the mini profile as "@Username"
